item.title: Migration Checklist
item.description:
Placeholder content.

This post will capture a practical checklist and reflections from moving between:

  • Shanghai
  • Champaign
  • San Jose
  • Back to Shanghai

Future content will be written with a Chinese-first audience in mind.
